text: Subject: mscf speaker series â€“ november 3rd confirmation dear mr . kaminski , it is a great pleasure and a great honor to schedule you on the mscf speaker series list for november 3rd . i will make a reservation for 8 persons at a restaurant in pittsburgh for that evening . also , if you want , i can book a hotel for you . let me know if you have anything in mind for the topic of the presentation . there are no real guidelines , as we like our speakers to have as much room as possible . here is one of the past presentations that had an impact : one of our speakers divided the presentation in two . the first part was technical ; the second was more general , explaining what his firm was looking for when hiring new employees . thank you very much for accepting our invitation . sincerely , pierre - philippe ste - marie pstemarie . homestead . com
